alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Southwest Utah; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 08 at 3:09AM MST until November 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For Iron and Millard Counties, winds are expected to increase Tuesday night and gusts may exceed 57 mph in isolated areas. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains and Tooele and Rush Valleys. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. This includes I-80 from the Nevada border to the Tooele valley.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Southwest Utah; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties
